monster.name: Bat

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 318, Curse of Strahd, Tomb of Annihilation, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
